snippet.title: Escape Tales: The Awakening - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Escape Tales: The Awakening Demo is part of the October 2024 edition of Steam Next Fest!

Escape Tales: The Awakening is a digital adaptation of the bestselling escape room card game by LockMe and Board&Dice. The full game is coming to Steam on October 24th, 2024.

In Escape Tales: The Awakening, you take on the role of Sam, a man whose wife passed away a few years ago and whose daughter has unexpectedly fallen into a coma for unknown reasons. With doctors insisting there was no way she could have fallen ill and a mysterious man gifting Sam "The Book of Rituals" - which claims to have the power to wake his daughter - Sam must fight to stay sane while confronting forces beyond his understanding.

In addition to immersing players in a dark, mysterious world, Escape Tales: The Awakening delivers a gripping narrative about loss, redemption, and the ghosts of the past. The game features open exploration, multiple endings, challenging puzzles, and an engaging story. Players' moral decisions will be tested, and their problem-solving skills pushed to the limit. Since the game has no time restrictions, you can take as long as you need to navigate its twists and turns.

In the demo, you'll experience the first location from the game. The stunning artwork draws you into the story, immersing you from the very first moment of gameplay. Want to see what the full version has in store? Try the demo on Steam!

#EscapeTales #EscapeGame #EscapeRoom
